Performance

4KB Random Write: Up to 343,000 IOPS

Features
Features: MEDS (Mushkin Enhanced Data-protection Suite) ensures valuable data is protected
- Built-in 4th Generation LDPC ECC provides the most-powerful data correction level in use today
- End-to-end data path protection
- SLC Caching
- Data shaping increases endurance
- StaticDataRefresh ensures data integrity
- Global wear-leveling evens program/erase counts across data blocks to extend lifespan

Enhanced Power Management

NVMe Security Erase support

NVMe Deallocate function support (NVMe equivalent of TRIM command)

High-reliability 3D NAND flash

S.M.A.R.T. support

Temperature sensor

RoHS, FCC, CE
